answers.answer: Preeclampsia,  just try to eat healthy and good low in salt , drink a lot of water
Honestly not much u could do tho cause it's something that is triggered by your pregnancy, maybe they'll induce u a bit eatlier. Good luck

Sorry, hun. I just had my first baby at 28 weeks due to preeclamsia. Had high protein levels plus high blood pressure.Make sure to stay calm and rest as much as possible. Monitor your BP!!! Doctor may prescribe bed rest or BP meds. Just do whatever is necessary!!!

question: i just had my baby 8 months ago and i had preeclampsia. now im 19 weeks pregnant and they found protein in my urine already idk wats goig to happen next can anyone help
title: preeclampsia help plz
